column5: Gee! Barr had to say “no fraud Biden won” because then McConnell couldn’t use the “Biden won let’s control the Senate to check him.” in Georgia. So Trump’s big lie was hurting things but McConnell couldn’t say it. So Barr interceded with ‘No fraud” for political reasons.  At the Atlantic!  Just finished reading it! William Barr Speaks  please add tags… LOL
